props.useLoader: Enable or disable spinner in the input
props.isLoading: If true displays spinner in the input. Spinner should be first enabled in `use-loading` prop
props.singleLineMessage: Limits the number of displayed errors to one at time. Order of messages is the same as order of `rules` in rules prop
props.showIndicator: Set to `true` or `false` to show open indicator. Useful for extending v-input for example adding dropdowns or popovers
props.indicatorSwitch: Set to `true` or `false` to set state of the open indicator. Useful for extending v-input for example adding dropdowns or popovers
props.width: Width of the component in px
props.label: Label on top of the input. This label is for simple forms as position cannot be changed
props.noMessages: If `true` validation messages are not displayed
props.closeButton: Attributes of input v-close-button component (clear button)
props.modIcon: Icon element if icon prop is true
props.modLabel: Label element if label prop is set
props.icon: Adds icon to input element. Valid value is the same as in v-icon components
props.clearable: Adds 'X' button that resets model to default value
props.customClearable: Adds 'X' button that only emits @click:clear-button event. It does not modify model value

emits.click:clear-button: Emitted after clicking clear button (if `custom-clearable` prop is set)

slots.label: Slot for label. Slot props: `label` (from label prop)
slots._input-extra: Slot for extra values that prepend input element (for example v-select component uses this slot to render selected items in multiple mode)
slots._input-control-extra: Slot for extra control elements after clear button (for example v-select component uses this slot to show toggle menu indicator)
